data_quality.source: Q3 2023 Consolidated Financial Statements and MD&A
data_quality.validation_notes: Extendicare is a healthcare services company with significant real estate ownership. Reports FFO/AFFO but NOT a traditional REIT. Limited portfolio metrics available as properties are owner-occupied (LTC homes) not investment properties. No GLA data. ACFO not reported by issuer - would need to be calculated in Phase 3.

dilution_detail.reconciliation_note: Dilution entirely from convertible debentures. Calculated: 96,106 - 85,218 = 10,888 units. Dilution %: (96,106 - 85,218) / 85,218 * 100 = 12.78%
dilution_detail.disclosure_source: Q3 2023 MD&A page 20, Table 25 - Weighted average shares basic and diluted

portfolio.note: Extendicare operates long-term care homes (owner-occupied, not investment properties). Portfolio metrics (property count, GLA, occupancy) not disclosed in same manner as REITs. Company operates 56 managed LTC homes via joint venture and owns equity interest in joint ventures.

other_adjustments.label: other_1
other_adjustments.description: Depreciation for FFEC (furniture, fixtures, equipment, computers) - maintenance capex deduction

other_adjustments.label: other_3
other_adjustments.description: Other expense (gain on sale of assets to joint venture)

other_adjustments.label: other_5
other_adjustments.description: Current income tax expense on other expense and fair value adjustments

other_adjustments.label: other_10
other_adjustments.description: Principal portion of government capital funding

other_adjustments.label: other_11
other_adjustments.description: Additional maintenance capex (actual spending beyond depreciation)

ffo_affo_components.affo_reconciliation_check: Net income 25,362 + FFO adjustments 12,213 = FFO 37,575. FFO 37,575 + AFFO adjustments 4,591 = AFFO 42,166. Reconciliation complete.

missing_adjustments_acfo: Issuer does not report ACFO - extraction not available. Phase 3 would need to calculate from CFO + adjustments if required.

cash_flow_investing.note: Detailed breakdown of investing activities not provided in cash flow statement. Total investing activities extracted from table on page 7 of financial statements: Purchase of property, equipment and intangible assets (109,192), Change in other assets 2,037. Extendicare properties are owner-occupied LTC homes, not investment properties, so traditional REIT categories don't apply.

cash_flow_financing.note: Detailed financing activities breakdown not fully disclosed in cash flow statement tables extracted. Distributions declared: $30,404 thousand (nine months ended Sep 30, 2023). Complete cash flow statement shows operating activities: $4,244 thousand.

liquidity.data_source: Balance sheet (cash: 96,252; restricted cash: 599), MD&A page 26 (credit facilities: $112.3M limit, $75.8M undrawn capacity). Credit facilities: one secured by 13 Class C LTC homes in Ontario, one secured by home health care business assets. As at Sep 30, 2023: $27.3M securing pension obligations, $3.0M for JV capital contributions, $6.2M for LTC home obligations = $36.5M drawn, leaving $75.8M undrawn.

validation.noi_margin_check: Nine months NOI margin: 108,244 / 954,776 = 11.3%. Reasonable for healthcare services company.
validation.interest_coverage_check: Trailing 12-month interest coverage ratio: 3.1x (per MD&A page 25). Adequate coverage.
validation.dilution_check: Convertible debentures: face value $126.5M. Dilutive effect: 10,888 units (12.78% dilution). Material dilution if converted.
validation.ffo_affo_validation: FFO payout ratio: $30,404 / $37,575 = 80.9%. AFFO payout ratio: $30,404 / $42,166 = 72.1%. Sustainable distribution levels.
